member.name: T:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.CharactersController
member.remarks: Contains character related API calls that are all publicly accessible.

member.remarks: Checks for an empty IHeaderCustomerGUID.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.CharactersController.Get(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Gets all character data by Character ID.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.CharactersController.GetByUserGUID(System.String)
member.remarks: Gets a list of Characters by UserGUID.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.CharactersController.GetByUserEmail(System.String)
member.remarks: Gets a list of Characters by Email.

member.summary: Get Characters Data by Character Name.
member.remarks: Gets a Characters by Name.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.CharactersController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Deletes a character by CharacterID.

member.name: T:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController
member.remarks: Contains user related API calls that are all publicly accessible.

member.summary: Constructor for Public User related API calls.
member.remarks: All dependencies are injected.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.Get
member.summary: Get a list of all Users.
member.remarks: Get a list of all OWS Users.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.Get(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Get all OWS User data.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.Put(System.Int32,System.String)
member.remarks: Save OWS User data.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Delete an OWS User permanently.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.CreateCharacter(OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.CreateCharacterRequest)
member.remarks: Create a new Character and attach it to the User referenced by the UserSessionGUID. ClassName is the name of the Class you setup in the management console (from the Characters tab). Classes are meant to be default values for creating characters. The purpose is to ensure that players are not able to hack their starting stats. This is needed because Characters are created from and unsecure UE4 client that has not connected to a UE4 server yet.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.GetPlayerGroupsCharacterIsIn(OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.GetPlayerGroupsCharacterIsInRequest)
member.summary: Gets a list of Player Groups that a Character is in.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.GetServerToConnectTo(OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.GetServerToConnectToRequest)
member.summary: Gets the server to connect to for a specific character or zonename.
member.remarks: Get the Zone Server to travel to based on the User referenced by the UserSessionGUID. Send in an empty ZoneName or ZoneName set to "GETLASTZONENAME" to use the last zone the Character was on rather than specifying a ZoneName.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.GetUserSession(OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.GetUserSessionRequest)
member.summary: Gets the User Session from a UserSessionGUID.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.LoginAndCreateSession(OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.LoginAndCreateSessionRequest)
member.summary: Login and create a User Session.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.ExternalLoginAndCreateSession(OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.ExternalLoginAndCreateSessionRequest)
member.summary: Login and create a User Session using an External Login Provider (such as Xsolla).

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.UserSessionSetSelectedCharacter(OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.UserSessionSetSelectedCharacterRequest)
member.summary: Set the Character that has been selected to play for a User Session.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Controllers.UsersController.SetSelectedCharacterAndGetUserSession(OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.SetSelectedCharacterAndGetUserSessionRequest)
member.summary: Set the Character that has been selected to play for a User Session and Get the User Session all in one call.

member.name: T:OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.CreateCharacterRequest
member.remarks: Handles api/Users/CreateCharacter requests.

member.name: P:OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.CreateCharacterRequest.UserSessionGUID
member.remarks: Contains the User Session GUID from the request. This identifies the User we are modifying.

member.name: P:OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.CreateCharacterRequest.CharacterName
member.remarks: Contains the Character Name from the request. This is the new Character Name to create.

member.name: P:OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.CreateCharacterRequest.ClassName
member.remarks: Contains the Class Name from the request. This sets the default values for the new Character.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.CreateCharacterRequest.SetData(OWSData.Repositories.Interfaces.IUsersRepository,OWSShared.Interfaces.IHeaderCustomerGUID)
member.remarks: Injects the dependencies for the CreateCharacterRequest.

member.name: M:OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.CreateCharacterRequest.Handle
member.remarks: Overrides IRequestHandler Handle().

member.remarks: The email is used as the primary ID for the sign in credentials.

member.name: P:OWSPublicAPI.Requests.Users.ExternalLoginAndCreateSessionRequest.Password
member.remarks: The password is part of the sign in credentials.
